title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code for my resume, along with a rendered HTML version for easier online viewing and distribution. It serves as a showcase project demonstrating my skills in document preparation using TeX and web development using HTML, providing a customizable and easily shareable resume template.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This interactive web application allows users to input their sleep schedule and desired sleep hours, providing insights into their accumulated sleep debt and aiding in establishing healthier sleep habits.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS for visualizing and interacting with Robofleet data. This project provides real-time monitoring and control capabilities, enabling users to effectively manage and observe robotic fleets through a user-friendly dashboard. It's a versatile tool for project-based robotics applications requiring robust fleet management solutions.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, it offers an intuitive interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, aiding in debugging and understanding robot system behavior. This project falls under the broader topic of ROS development and aims to streamline log analysis workflows.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a modern web application built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and React, leveraging MUI for its UI components. This project showcases best practices for building scalable and maintainable React applications, incorporating React Query for efficient data fetching and state management. It explores a variety of topics including component-based architecture, data fetching strategies, and UI design principles, serving as a comprehensive reference for developers looking to build similar projects.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-Event-Calendar is a project showcasing a customizable and interactive event calendar built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. It allows users to dynamically display and manage events, offering a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for scheduling and organization. This repository serves as a learning resource and demonstration of front-end web development techniques for creating dynamic calendar applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a full-stack IoT asset tracking application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and styled with Tailwind CSS. It leverages Supabase for backend data storage and authentication, offering a modern and scalable solution for monitoring and managing physical assets using IoT devices. This project demonstrates a practical implementation of real-time data visualization and asset management principles using cutting-edge web technologies.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern, responsive admin dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides a clean and intuitive user interface for managing data and performing administrative tasks, demonstrating best practices for building scalable and maintainable web applications with Next.js. The repository serves as a learning resource and a practical example of a real-world project using these technologies.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project exploring modern web development techniques using TypeScript and JavaScript. This repository showcases a [briefly mention project's goal, e.g., "real-time chat application" or "task management system"], leveraging [mention key libraries or frameworks, e.g., "React and Node.js"] to create a [mention the project's type, e.g., "dynamic and responsive user interface" or "scalable backend solution"]. It serves as a learning resource and a demonstration of best practices in [mention specific areas of focus, e.g., "state management, component architecture, and API integration"].

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Vite.js, and Express.js, leveraging the Gemini API to provide an interactive platform for [add the purpose of the application here - e.g., creative writing, brainstorming, language learning, etc.]. This project demonstrates best practices in modern web development and explores the integration of AI-powered language models in a practical, user-friendly interface.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, serving as a dynamic platform for brainstorming, organizing, and prioritizing ideas. It leverages modern web technologies to provide a user-friendly interface for managing projects and fostering collaboration within teams. This repository offers a practical solution for individuals and groups seeking to streamline their idea generation process and enhance project management workflows.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter Notebooks implementing various financial analysis and modeling projects using Python. It explores topics like portfolio optimization, risk management, time series analysis, and algorithmic trading, leveraging popular Python libraries for data manipulation and financial calculations. This project provides practical examples and educational resources for learning finance concepts through Python programming.

title: next-voting
description: Next-Voting is a modern, decentralized voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows for secure and transparent voting processes, leveraging modern web technologies to create a user-friendly experience. It showcases a practical application of blockchain principles and provides a platform for building robust and auditable voting systems.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project using HTML and Python to create interactive map visualizations. This repository explores techniques for displaying geographical data and insights on a map, focusing on effective visual representation and user interaction. It leverages web technologies and Python scripting to process and present location-based information in a compelling and informative way.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a web-based CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application built with Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL, offering a streamlined interface for managing data. Utilizing HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for presentation and deployment, this project showcases a practical implementation of a Python web application with database integration, covering key topics like Flask framework, PostgreSQL database interaction, and basic project structuring.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a web-based project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, focusing on interactive visualization and exploration. The repository showcases a dynamic and engaging user experience, exploring different features based on client needs.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a full-stack e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and React. It leverages MUI for a responsive and visually appealing user interface and utilizes React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. This project demonstrates a practical application of modern web development technologies for creating a complete online shopping experience, focusing on type safety and efficient data management.
